verses.verse: Him that is weak <S%G770><s%> in the faith <S%G4102><s%> receive ye <S%G4355><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> doubtful <S%G1261><s%> disputations <S%G1253><s%>.

For <S%G3303><s%> one <S%G3739><s%> believeth <S%G4100><s%> that he may eat <S%G5315><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>: another <S%G1161><s%>, who is weak <S%G770><s%>, eateth <S%G2068><s%> herbs <S%G3001><s%>.

Let <S%G1848><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> him that eateth <S%G2068><s%> despise <S%G1848><s%> him that eateth <S%G2068><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> let <S%G2068><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> him which eateth <S%G2068><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> him that eateth <S%G2068><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath received <S%G4355><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

Who <S%G5101><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> that judgest <S%G2919><s%> another man's <S%G245><s%> servant <S%G3610><s%>? to his own <S%G2398><s%> master <S%G2962><s%> he standeth <S%G4739><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> falleth <S%G4098><s%>. Yea <S%G1161><s%>, he shall be holden up <S%G2476><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> able <S%G1415><s%> to make <S%G2476><s%> him <S%G846><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%>.

One <S%G3303><s%> man <S%G3739><s%> esteemeth <S%G2919><s%> one day <S%G2250><s%> above <S%G3844><s%> another <S%G2250><s%> <S%G1161><s%>: another <S%G3739><s%> esteemeth <S%G2919><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> alike. Let <S%G4135><s%> every man <S%G1538><s%> be fully persuaded <S%G4135><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> mind <S%G3563><s%>.

He that regardeth <S%G5426><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%>, regardeth <S%G5426><s%> it unto the Lord <S%G2962><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he that regardeth <S%G5426><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%>, to the Lord <S%G2962><s%> he doth <S%G5426><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> regard <S%G5426><s%> it. He that eateth <S%G2068><s%>, eateth <S%G2068><s%> to the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, for <S%G1063><s%> he giveth God <S%G2316><s%> thanks <S%G2168><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he that eateth <S%G2068><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>, to the Lord <S%G2962><s%> he eateth <S%G2068><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> giveth God <S%G2316><s%> thanks <S%G2168><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> of us <S%G2257><s%> liveth <S%G2198><s%> to himself <S%G1438><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> dieth <S%G599><s%> to himself <S%G1438><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> whether <S%G1437><s%> <S%G5037><s%> we live <S%G2198><s%>, we live <S%G2198><s%> unto the Lord <S%G2962><s%>; and whether <S%G1437><s%> <S%G5037><s%> we die <S%G599><s%>, we die <S%G599><s%> unto the Lord <S%G2962><s%>: whether <S%G1437><s%> <S%G5037><s%> we live <S%G2198><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%>, or <S%G1437><s%> <S%G5037><s%> die <S%G599><s%>, we are <S%G2070><s%> the Lord's <S%G2962><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> end Christ <S%G5547><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> died <S%G599><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> rose <S%G450><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> revived <S%G326><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> he might be Lord <S%G2961><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> of the dead <S%G3498><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> living <S%G2198><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> dost <S%G2919><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> brother <S%G80><s%>? or <S%G2228><s%> <S%G2532><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> dost <S%G1848><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> set at nought <S%G1848><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> brother <S%G80><s%>? for <S%G1063><s%> we shall <S%G3936><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> stand before <S%G3936><s%> the judgment seat <S%G968><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%>, As I <S%G1473><s%> live <S%G2198><s%>, saith <S%G3004><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3754><s%>, every <S%G3956><s%> knee <S%G1119><s%> shall bow <S%G2578><s%> to me <S%G1698><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> tongue <S%G1100><s%> shall confess <S%G1843><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%>.
So <S%G3767><s%> then <S%G686><s%> every one <S%G1538><s%> of us <S%G2257><s%> shall give <S%G1325><s%> account <S%G3056><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%>.

Let us <S%G2919><s%> not therefore <S%G3767><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> one another <S%G240><s%> any more <S%G3371><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%>, that no man <S%G3361><s%> put <S%G5087><s%> a stumblingblock <S%G4348><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> an occasion to fall <S%G4625><s%> in his brother's way <S%G80><s%>.

I know <S%G1492><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> am persuaded <S%G3982><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> there is nothing <S%G3762><s%> unclean <S%G2839><s%> of <S%G1223><s%> itself <S%G1438><s%>: but <S%G1508><s%> to him that esteemeth <S%G3049><s%> any thing <S%G5100><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> unclean <S%G2839><s%>, to him <S%G1565><s%> it is unclean <S%G2839><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> be grieved <S%G3076><s%> with <S%G1223><s%> thy meat <S%G1033><s%>, now <S%G3765><s%> walkest thou <S%G4043><s%> not <S%G3765><s%> charitably <S%G26><s%> <S%G2596><s%>. Destroy <S%G622><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> him <S%G1565><s%> with thy <S%G4675><s%> meat <S%G1033><s%>, for <S%G5228><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> died <S%G599><s%>.
Let not <S%G3361><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> good <S%G18><s%> be evil spoken of <S%G987><s%>:

For <S%G1063><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> meat <S%G1035><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drink <S%G4213><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> he that in <S%G1722><s%> these things <S%G5125><s%> serveth <S%G1398><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> is acceptable <S%G2101><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> approved <S%G1384><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>.

Let us <S%G1377><s%> therefore <S%G686><s%> <S%G3767><s%> follow after <S%G1377><s%> the things which make for <S%G3588><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> things wherewith <S%G1519><s%> one <S%G240><s%> may edify <S%G3619><s%> another <S%G240><s%>.

For <S%G1752><s%> meat <S%G1033><s%> destroy <S%G2647><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> the work <S%G2041><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>. All things <S%G3956><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> are pure <S%G2513><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> it is evil <S%G2556><s%> for that man <S%G444><s%> who eateth <S%G2068><s%> with <S%G1223><s%> offence <S%G4348><s%>.

It is good <S%G2570><s%> neither <S%G3361><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> flesh <S%G2907><s%>, nor <S%G3366><s%> to drink <S%G4095><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%>, nor <S%G3366><s%> any thing whereby <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> stumbleth <S%G4350><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> is offended <S%G4624><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> is made weak <S%G770><s%>.

Hast <S%G2192><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>? have <S%G2192><s%> it to <S%G2596><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>. Happy <S%G3107><s%> is he that condemneth <S%G2919><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that thing which <S%G3739><s%> he alloweth <S%G1381><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he that doubteth <S%G1252><s%> is damned <S%G2632><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> he eat <S%G5315><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> he eateth not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>: for <S%G1161><s%> whatsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3956><s%> is not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>.
